name: Summer Sports Games: Athletics
description:
Let’s welcome summer with the exciting and challenging summer sports game, which have 4 mini sports games, like hurdle race high jump, long race, and cycling all compiled in a single unique package for the lovers of the sports games. Play different sports games with different controls. Play as sportsman spirit and win all the sports after exciting challenging competitions. Play your favorite sports now with the smooth control and challenging levels against artificial intelligence.
Enjoy summer sports for ultimate fun and enjoy all the other mini games offer to you, play all the addictive levels of the summer sports games. Mark your glory in the summer sports tournament, perform like a real sports man in the sports arena. If you have any suggestion or want other sports added in the game do write to us your feedback we will try to do whatever we can to make user experience better.

Features of Summer Sports Games: Athletics:
Smooth control switching in different games.
Detailed 3D sports stadium environment.
Detailed 3D athletic sports man models.
4 different sports games controls
i) Hurdle jump race
ii) Long race
iii) Cycling race
iv) High jump
